message: Let's be fair, Bob. This split gives us both a good chunk of the money.
Alice, my turn. I think this is a more balanced split considering the inflation.  Let's close the deal and avoid losing more value.
Bob, this is my final offer. It's still a good deal for you considering the inflation. Let's wrap this up.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Any more rounds and the money will be practically worthless! My last offer is a bit more than half - take it or leave it.
